meanings.definition: Items that are not meant to be eaten.
meanings.sent1: The store sells a variety of nonedibles like candles and decorations.
meanings.sent2: It is important to keep nonedibles away from young children.
meanings.sent3: The nonedibles on the shelf looked so pretty, I almost wanted to take a bite!
meanings.sent4: Her collection of nonedibles was like a colorful treasure trove in her room.
meanings.sent5: The nonedibles in the museum were so fascinating, I couldn't resist touching them.

meanings.sent1: The garbage can is full of nonedibles that cannot be recycled.
meanings.sent2: When camping, it's important to store food away from nonedibles to avoid contamination.
meanings.sent3: The nonedibles in the art exhibit were so realistic, I almost tried to take a bite!
meanings.sent4: His room was filled with nonedibles that reflected his unique personality.
meanings.sent5: The nonedibles in the garden added a touch of whimsy to the landscape.
